partial-keepinv.gui.error.server_req: You need to be on a server to access these settings.
partial-keepinv.gui.tooltip.static: What percentage of items should be dropped.
partial-keepinv.gui.tooltip.common: What percentage of common items should be dropped.
partial-keepinv.gui.tooltip.uncommon: What percentage of uncommon items should be dropped.
partial-keepinv.gui.tooltip.rare: What percentage of rare items should be dropped.
partial-keepinv.gui.tooltip.epic: What percentage of epic items should be dropped.
partial-keepinv.gui.tooltip.invexpressio: Define how many items should be dropped with your own formula.
partial-keepinv.gui.text.invexpression:
- spawnDistance:
            Distance from player to spawnpoint.
- spawnX, spawnY, spawnZ:
            Spawn coordinates
- playerX, playerY, playerZ:
            Player coordinates.
- rarityPercent:
            Get droprate from rarity as set in the config.
- isEpic, isRare, isCommon, isUncommon:
            Return 1.0 if true
- dropPercent:
            Inventory droprate as set in the config
partial-keepinv.gui.tooltip.xploss: How much XP to lose on death.
partial-keepinv.gui.tooltip.xpdrop: How much of the lost XP to drop as XP orbs.
